hero.title: Bittaa Salphaatti
hero.subtitle: Bittaa Guyyaa Keessan Jalqabaa
hero.description: Oomishaalee haaraa gatii gaarii waliin. Hanga 40% OFF meeshaalee filataman irratti.

featured.title: Oomishaalee Filatamaa
featured.subtitle: Oomishaalee gatii olaanaa harkaan filataman, waliigaltee addaa irraa kaasee hanga meeshaalee beekamaa ta'anitti sakatta'aa

brands.title: Brandoota Filatamaa
brands.subtitle: Brandoota filatamaa keenya fi oomishaalee isaanii argadhaa
